dct_title_s: Map of the Island of Bombay : index to progress
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:14,400]. 1 in. = 1200 ft. Relief shown by hachures and form lines. Index to cities with epidemic statistics. Includes script signature for"chairman plague committee."
132 x 71 centimeters, on sheets each 68 x 75 centimeters
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
